text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to date a christian girl?
text.Response A:
Be up front about who you are.
Find out what she likes to do.
Find common ground.
Know what her religion's position is on dating.
Get a date.
Encourage her to share her beliefs.
Go to church with her.
Make yourself part of her spiritual community.
Take time to enjoy one another.
Set boundaries.
Make important decisions together.
Meet one another's needs.
text.Response B: Sure! You can just ask her out, but I can also give you a few tips to help you prepare. You might want to talk about your shared faith and values, and also just make sure you’re on the same page about things like whether you want to get married and have kids someday.

57.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to date a christian girl?

Response A

Be up front about who you are.
Find out what she likes to do.
Find common ground.
Know what her religion's position is on dating.
Get a date.
Encourage her to share her beliefs.
Go to church with her.
Make yourself part of her spiritual community.
Take time to enjoy one another.
Set boundaries.
Make important decisions together.
Meet one another's needs.

Response B

Sure! You can just ask her out, but I can also give you a few tips to help you prepare. You might want to talk about your shared faith and values, and also just make sure you’re on the same page about things like whether you want to get married and have kids someday.
